title: Virtual Learning Environment-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program for Engineering Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Engineering mathematics fundamentals (calculus, linear algebra) and basic educational theory
context.additional_context: Customized learning environment to improve mathematical problem-solving skills required in engineering education settings for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Advanced mathematical concepts (differential equations, matrix operations) required for engineering problem-solving can be applied with 80% accuracy.
Using a Virtual Learning Environment (VLE), nonlinear circuit analysis problems can be self-directedly solved within seven days.
When designing math-based engineering projects, digital tools (MATLAB, Python) can achieve simulation accuracy of over 90%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
